languages.text: "Знаешь, я к нему как-то привязался. Имей терпение. Вот сейчас мне что-нибудь отстрелят, и ты сможешь меня улучшить".
"Funnily enough, I have grown rather attached to the old thing. Have patience — someone will shoot me any minute now, and then you will have your chance to upgrade me."
languages.original_text: "Знаешь, я к нему как-то привязался. Имей терпение. Вот сейчас мне что-нибудь отстрелят, и ты сможешь меня улучшить".

traits.locale_text: "Funnily enough, I have grown rather attached to the old thing. Have patience — someone will shoot me any minute now, and then you will have your chance to upgrade me."
"Funnily enough, I have grown rather attached to the old thing. Have patience — someone will shoot me any minute now, and then you will have your chance to upgrade me."
"Funnily enough, I have grown rather attached to the old thing. Have patience — someone will shoot me any minute now, and then you will have your chance to upgrade me."
"Funnily enough, I have grown rather attached to the old thing. Have patience — someone will shoot me any minute now, and then you will have your chance to upgrade me."

languages.text: “说来也怪，我对我这老胳膊老腿产生了相当深厚的感情。耐心点吧，随时都可能会有人朝我开枪，到时候你就有机会给我进行升级了。”
languages.original_text: "Funnily enough, I have grown rather attached to the old thing. Have patience — someone will shoot me any minute now, and then you will have your chance to upgrade me."

traits.locale_text: “说来也怪，我对我这老胳膊老腿产生了相当深厚的感情。耐心点吧，随时都可能会有人朝我开枪，到时候你就有机会给我进行升级了。”

languages.text: «Curiosamente, me he encariñado con este viejo trasto. Sea paciente: alguien me disparará más pronto que tarde, y entonces tendrá la oportunidad de mejorarme».
languages.original_text: "Funnily enough, I have grown rather attached to the old thing. Have patience — someone will shoot me any minute now, and then you will have your chance to upgrade me."

traits.locale_text: «Curiosamente, me he encariñado con este viejo trasto. Sea paciente: alguien me disparará más pronto que tarde, y entonces tendrá la oportunidad de mejorarme».

languages.text: 「面白いことに、私は古いものに愛着がわいてきていてね。しばらくは我慢したまえ。何、そう遠くないうちに私は撃たれるだろう。そうすれば、君は私を強化するチャンスだ」
languages.original_text: "Funnily enough, I have grown rather attached to the old thing. Have patience — someone will shoot me any minute now, and then you will have your chance to upgrade me."

traits.locale_text: 「面白いことに、私は古いものに愛着がわいてきていてね。しばらくは我慢したまえ。何、そう遠くないうちに私は撃たれるだろう。そうすれば、君は私を強化するチャンスだ」

languages.text: "Ehrlich gesagt, hänge ich ziemlich an meinen alten Knochen. Geduldet Euch ... gewiss wird mich gleich jemand erschießen. Dann könnt Ihr mich meinetwegen verbessern."
languages.original_text: "Funnily enough, I have grown rather attached to the old thing. Have patience — someone will shoot me any minute now, and then you will have your chance to upgrade me."

traits.locale_text: "Ehrlich gesagt, hänge ich ziemlich an meinen alten Knochen. Geduldet Euch ... gewiss wird mich gleich jemand erschießen. Dann könnt Ihr mich meinetwegen verbessern."

languages.text: « Je suis hélas quelque peu attaché à mon organisme. Mais faites preuve de patience. Je finirai bien par me faire trouer la peau, et vous aurez alors tout le loisir de m'améliorer comme bon vous semble. »
languages.original_text: "Funnily enough, I have grown rather attached to the old thing. Have patience — someone will shoot me any minute now, and then you will have your chance to upgrade me."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis hélas quelque peu attaché à mon organisme. Mais faites preuve de patience. Je finirai bien par me faire trouer la peau, et vous aurez alors tout le loisir de m'améliorer comme bon vous semble. »

languages.original_text: "Funnily enough, I have grown rather attached to the old thing. Have patience — someone will shoot me any minute now, and then you will have your chance to upgrade me."

languages.text: "Gariptir ki bu kart bedene epey bağlandım. Sabret, yakında birinin beni vurması işten bile değil. O zaman ne güncellemesi istiyorsan yaparsın."
languages.original_text: "Funnily enough, I have grown rather attached to the old thing. Have patience — someone will shoot me any minute now, and then you will have your chance to upgrade me."

traits.locale_text: "Gariptir ki bu kart bedene epey bağlandım. Sabret, yakında birinin beni vurması işten bile değil. O zaman ne güncellemesi istiyorsan yaparsın."
